text: The Sobradinho Dam is a large hydroelectric dam built on the São Francisco River in Sobradinho, in the state of Bahia of Brazil. Completed in 1982, the dam generates power by utilizing six Francis turbine-generators, totalling the installed capacity to .Hydroelectric power stations in Bahia, Brazil == See also == * List of power stations in Brazil * List of conventional hydroelectric power stations == References == Category:Dams completed in 1982 Category:Energy infrastructure completed in 1982 Category:Dams in Bahia Category:Hydroelectric power stations in Brazil Category:Dams on the São Francisco River Category:1982 establishments in Brazil
title: Sobradinho Dam
